snippet: A greater appreciation for the virtues of transparency has been one of the most important shifts in central banking in recent decades.
abstract: News analysis; Federal Reserve's decision to announce specific economic objectives for its policies highlights general shift in central banking toward transparency; Fed Chairman Ben S Bernanke has slowly embraced new tactic over last two years, surrendering secrecy that was prized by many of his predecessors.
lead_paragraph: A greater appreciation for the virtues of transparency has been one of the most important shifts in central banking in recent decades.
